pr_title: [FLINK-18457][docs] Fix invalid links in "Detecting Patterns" page of "Streaming Concepts"

timeline.message: [FLINK-18457][docs] Fix invalid links in "Detecting Patterns" page of "Streaming Concepts"

timeline.author: wuchong
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1038,7 +1038,7 @@ use [time attributes](time_attributes.html). To select those there are available

Returns the timestamp of the last row that was mapped to the given pattern.

The resulting attribute is a rowtime attribute that can be used in subsequent time-based operations such as - interval joins and group window or over + interval joins and group window or over

timeline.bodyText: I guess this is an invalid link. Could you try to build_docs.sh in your local to verify this?
timeline.author: wuchong
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1038,7 +1038,7 @@ use [time attributes](time_attributes.html). To select those there are available

Returns the timestamp of the last row that was mapped to the given pattern.

The resulting attribute is a rowtime attribute that can be used in subsequent time-based operations such as - interval joins and group window or over + interval joins and group window or over

replies.bodyText:
Yes, @wuchong . You are right.
I'm so sorry for this mistake !
I corrected the invalid links based on your suggestions and tips of build_docs.sh.
Thank you for your reminding !
replies.author: RocMarshal
